TopicTitle: Since When Was the Shuttle in Kerbal?

Articles.Content:
http://variedmind.weebly.com/uploads/2/6/2/4/26244365/9786483_orig.png

I took a picture of the United States space shuttle, and I overlayed the HUD of Kerbal onto it! I hope you guys like it!
That velocity reading is wrong. It should be around 7200m/s, as that is our Earth's LEO orbital velocity.
This was something I made in five minutes, because I didn't feel like spending all night on it... thank you though!

I like it!

Wish KSP could have such good graphics *drools*
